PerfectNetExp.abs: 存在螺旋狸藻属(Genlisea)中。这种捕虫器呈现螺纹的棒形构造，里面附有逆生的细毛，若有小生物进入后便无法后退，只能不断往前 …

means.word_mean: 1. rootless carnivorous swamp plants having at the base of the stem a rosette of foliage and trap-leaves consisting of slender tubes swollen in the middle; each tube passes into two long spirally twisted arms with stiff hairs
